name: Deep Slash
description: Surprise an enemy with a sweeping lunge, dealing 1799 Physical Damage to them and other nearby enemies. You reduce the Movement Speed of all enemies hit by 30% for 4 seconds.  Also afflicts all enemies hit with Minor Maim, reducing their damage done by 5% for 12 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the damage dealt.  Now hits all targets near the initial enemy hit, and snares them.
coefDescription: Surprise an enemy with a sweeping lunge, dealing $1 Physical Damage to them and other nearby enemies. You reduce the Movement Speed of all enemies hit by 30% for 4 seconds.  Also afflicts all enemies hit with Minor Maim, reducing their damage done by 5% for 12 seconds.
